review: So easy to navigate. Absolutely simple setup. Have both Apple TV and Amazon Fire in the house and use Amazon Fire exclusively now. Much better remote and interface experience. Plus, I already had prime and Apple TV wouldn't let me put in an app for Prime use. Really glad I got Amazon Fire TV and may end up even getting rid of cable now!
